description: Provides an Elastic Transcoder pipeline resource.

Bucket.description: The Amazon S3 bucket in which you want Elastic Transcoder to save transcoded files and playlists.

StorageClass.description: The Amazon S3 storage class, Standard or ReducedRedundancy, that you want Elastic Transcoder to assign to the files and playlists that it stores in your Amazon S3 bucket.

Access.description: The permission that you want to give to the AWS user that you specified in `content_config_permissions.grantee`.

Grantee.description: The AWS user or group that you want to have access to transcoded files and playlists.

GranteeType.description: Specify the type of value that appears in the `content_config_permissions.grantee` object. Valid values are `Canonical`, `Email` or `Group`.

Completed.description: The topic ARN for the Amazon SNS topic that you want to notify when Elastic Transcoder has finished processing a job in this pipeline.

Error.description: The topic ARN for the Amazon SNS topic that you want to notify when Elastic Transcoder encounters an error condition while processing a job in this pipeline.

Progressing.description: The topic ARN for the Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) topic that you want to notify when Elastic Transcoder has started to process a job in this pipeline.

Warning.description: The topic ARN for the Amazon SNS topic that you want to notify when Elastic Transcoder encounters a warning condition while processing a job in this pipeline.

Bucket.description: The Amazon S3 bucket in which you want Elastic Transcoder to save thumbnail files.

StorageClass.description: The Amazon S3 storage class, Standard or ReducedRedundancy, that you want Elastic Transcoder to assign to the thumbnails that it stores in your Amazon S3 bucket.

Access.description: The permission that you want to give to the AWS user that you specified in `thumbnail_config_permissions.grantee`.

Grantee.description: The AWS user or group that you want to have access to thumbnail files.

GranteeType.description: Specify the type of value that appears in the `thumbnail_config_permissions.grantee` object.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

AwsKmsKeyArn.description: The AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) key that you want to use with this pipeline.

InputBucket.description: The Amazon S3 bucket in which you saved the media files that you want to transcode and the graphics that you want to use as watermarks.

Name.description: The name of the pipeline. Maximum 40 characters.

OutputBucket.description: The Amazon S3 bucket in which you want Elastic Transcoder to save the transcoded files.

Role.description: The IAM Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the role that you want Elastic Transcoder to use to transcode jobs for this pipeline.
